articles.title: U.S., European allies discuss banning imports of Russian oil - Reuters
articles.description: The United States and European allies are exploring banning imports of Russian oil, U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken said on Sunday, and the White House coordinated with key Congressional committees moving forward with their own ban.
